title: Topic 001 Question 938
body: A company wants its Amazon EC2 instances to share the same geographic area but use redundant underlying power sources.
Which solution will meet these requirements?
options: Use EC2 instances across multiple Availability Zones in the same AWS Region.
Use Amazon CloudFront as the database for the EC2 instances.
Use EC2 instances in the same edge location and the same Availability Zone.
Use EC2 instances in AWS OpsWorks stacks in different AWS Regions.
